= DBF (XBase File Reader) =

== Description ==

DBF is an ActionScript 3 library for parsing [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DBASE XBase files]. The current version is capable of reading basic DBase IV files, but doesn't do any extended header checking.

== Download ==

The current release is Beta 0.1. It can be obtained using SVN:

{{{svn checkout http://vanrijkom-flashlibs.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/org/vanrijkom/dbf}}}
